input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item features and item name.

Item name:
Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop with 44 Inch Acrylic Backboard

Item features:
44 Inch steel framed acrylic backboard
The Slam jam breakaway rim is a 5/8 Inch heavy-duty solid steel rim. Includes a white, all-weather net.
The Ratchet lift provides rim height adjustment from 8 feet to 10 feet in 4-inch increments
Three pieces 3 Inch round pole
35-gallon capacity base filled with water or sand for stability
The portable Basketball Rim adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop has a 44 inch acrylic backboard, a Slam jam breakaway rim, a ratchet lift for adjusting the rim height, and a 35-gallon base for stability. The portable basketball hoop adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet.
input_text.Response B: This Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop with 44 Inch Acrylic Backboard has a 44 Inch steel framed acrylic backboard, a Slam jam breakaway rim, and a white, all-weather net. The Ratchet lift provides rim height adjustment from 8 feet to 10 feet in 4-inch increments. The portable Basketball Rim adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet. It is made of three pieces 3 Inch round pole and has a 35-gallon capacity base filled with water or sand for stability.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
